page.title: 01GAZATTEER
page.content: THE BLOCK ALLOCATED TO OUR GROUP LIES TO THE NORTH OF GLENROTHES.MUCH OF THIS IS FARMLAND,USED MOSTLY FOR CEREALS,ALTHOUGH AREAS ARE USED FOR FORESTRY.THE SOUTHERN AREA OF THE BLOCK CONSISTS OF BOTH PRIVATE AND COUNCIL HOUSING SCHEMES,ALMOST ALL CONSTRUCTED DURING THE LAST 5 YEARS. DURING THE COURSE OF THE SURVEY A NUMBER OF TOPICS WILL BE RESEARCHED. RESIDENTS OF THE AREA WILL BE QUESTIONED ON THE AREA TO DISCOVER THEIR OPINIONS REGARDING SUCH AMENITIES AS SHOPPING AND LEISURE FACILITIES.RESEARCH WILL BE CARRIED OUT TO DETERMINE THE AVERAGE AGE AND SIZE OF FAMILIES IN THE BLOCK,AND ALSO ON HOW THESE PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED. TRANSPORT SERVICES IN THE AREA WILL ALSO BE STUDIED.AT SOME POINT AN IN-DEPTH PERSONAL INTERVIEW WILL BE CONDUCTED.
